name: Magical 0ps
description:
You take control of a girl named Andreía, who gets befriends a monster on the run from some magical girls. She gets entangled in the Magical Girl world from there.

Team Credits:

Game Dev: GameMaster1

Composers: Suliac, Jack Watters, Ben Tibbetts

Guest Composers: Lunnii, Prizrak

Artists: ToxicMistressMoon, pinx, Effy Stonem

Dev Note: This game is inspired by the lore and world of Magical Camp by HLF and JackyHF.  For those who are wondering, even though Magical Camp is a NSFW game, this game, Magical 0ps, is very much a SFW game.

Current Content: The current demo contains the intro and parking lot area.
